import React from 'react' import './statics/styles/Block.scss' import Avatar from '@material-ui/core/Avatar' import { MoreHoriz, Mail } from '@material-ui/icons' import Moment from 'react-moment' import 'moment/locale/fr' import { BeatLoader as Load } from 'react-spinners' function Block ({ isLeft, url, text, typeKey }) { return (
{ typeKey ? : text }
{ new Date() }
) } export default Block
